title: Mirror House” - Novel Updates
tags: Confinement   Death   Female Protagonist   Gore   Oneshot
author: Maaba   麻婆
description:
I thought it was rather strange.
'Why did you split Sato C’-san's head open??'
I couldn't instantly think of a motive for killing someone with the same face.

Me and me. You and you. A frenzied mirror house story.>
